summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to security from terrorism; authorizing the City to partner with the State of Washington and King County to receive financial assistance from the Department of Homeland Security (DHS), Office for State and Local Government Coordination and Preparedness under the Urban Areas Security Initiative Grant for Federal Fiscal Year 2005 (UASI 05); authorizing an application for allocation of funds under that agreement; increasing appropriations to the Police Department, the Fire Department, the Department of Information Technology, and the Fleets and Facilities Department in the 2005 Budget; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
